description:
Reignite the love for emoticons A simple app which lists a bunch of emoticons (not emojis!). Features:
  • Browse through a list of emoticons which you can copy to clipboard without using internet or any websites.
  • Add or modify your own emoticons.
  • Search using related tags.
  • Reorder them to your liking
  • Import and export the database.
App is written in Flutter, using Material 3 and supports dark/light mode.
